overview:
As Executive Director of Human Resources, Austin is responsible for directing the operations of Human Resources functions at an enterprise level. Austin has a proven track record of strategic growth and culture development within an organization and has a passion for building high performing, happy employees.

As a Human Resource and Recruiting leader, he specializes in creating and improving operational metrics, and improving company drive toward top revenue. Prior to AtTask, Austin worked with CirclePix, Utah Valley University, SirsiDynix, and Omniture.

When Austin has free time he enjoys spending time with his three boys and beautiful wife. He also loves playing a good paintball game and watching football.

Austin received his bachelor’s degree in Philosophy from Utah Valley University, and his Masters degree in Human Resource Leadership from Sullivan University. Austin was also recognized in the Who’s Who of growing leaders in Utah.
